{{Infobox_Radio_station | name = 99.1 Love Radio | image = [[File:Naga 99.1 (DWYN).jpg]] | city = [[Naga City, Camarines Sur|Naga City]] | area = [[Bicol Region]] | branding = 99.1 Love Radio | slogan = "Kailangan pa bang i-memorize 'yan? Bisyo na to'!"
(Tagalog for "Do you have to memorize that? It's addictive!") | airdate = 1991 (FM Band) | frequency = 99.1 MHz | format = [[pop music|pop]], [[Original Pilipino Music|OPM]] | power = 10,000 [[watt]]s | erp = | class = A,B,C | callsign_meaning = DWYN | owner = [[Manila Broadcasting Company]] | website = http://www.mbcradio.net/ | sister_stations= [[DWMT|DZRH 981 Naga]], [[DZTR|The Beat 89.5]] }} '''99.1 Love Radio''' (DWYN 99.1 MHz [[Naga City, Camarines Sur|Naga City]]) is a music [[FM broadcasting|FM]] station owned by [[Manila Broadcasting Company]] in the [[Philippines]]. The station's [[studio]] is located at the 2/F, DMG Bldg, Penafrancia Ave., [[Naga City, Camarines Sur|Naga City]]. ==Love Radio stations== :''Further information: [[Manila Broadcasting Company, Inc.#Love Radio stations|Love Radio stations]]'' ==See also== *[[DZRH]] *[[Manila Broadcasting Company]] *[[The Beat Naga|The Beat 89.5 Naga]] {{Naga City FM}} {{Philippines-radio-station-stub}} {{coord missing|Philippines}} [[Category:Naga City radio stations]] [[Category:Adult contemporary radio stations in the Philippines]] [[Category:Radio stations established in 1991]] [[ceb:DWYN]]
